document_data.name: Pierson
document_data.mainbody: '''Pierson''' was a male [[human]] of the village of [[West Harbor]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: Pierson was one of the members of [[West Harbor]] militia. He was a reluctant friend of thieves, since he kept goods he collected over the years. During the battle against [[duergar]] and [[githyanki]], Pierson could've been asked to join the attack. Regardless, he was killed in the battle.
